name: Trash Destroyer (Raferat studios)
description:
You are in 2025. Water is so polluted so when you touch it you instantly die. Your goal is to clean all trash in the water. Whenever you die, you will be respawned in trash cans all over the map. 

controls: 

  • Left click mouse to shoot.
  • Right click mouse to use grappling gun.
  • Press K to commit suicide.
  • Use Esc to quit the game entirely.
  • W A S D to move
  • space to jump

To complete the game get to the last trash can.

Rivers flow to the oceans so this is submitted to SEAJAM gamejam.

Dani if you want I will remove your face from the game. Please don't sue me.
